<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Radiant Field](/Spells.aspx?ID=2361)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 259

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot [burst](/Rules.aspx?ID=2385)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Fortitude

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You create an area of [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2402). Creatures with [light blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=68) that are [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=59) by radiant field and remain in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turns. On a failure, a creature remains blinded for 1 round; this is an [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=631) effect. This spell also suppresses magical [darkness](/Rules.aspx?ID=2404) of your radiant field spell’s rank or lower.

---
**Heightened (4th)** Creatures seen through the area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) to creatures outside the area. Creatures with light blindness can continue to be blinded by the field as long as the field is visible, even when outside of the field.
name: Radiant Field
